entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 11:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 10:25 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:25 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:25 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
